title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Pawan Khera Defends AI Video Amid BJP Criticism
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Tencent poaches OpenAI researcher Yao Shunyu with reported $14M deal amid AI talent war
description: The global race for artificial intelligence talent just got a lot more dramatic. Tencent Holdings has reportedly hired Yao Shunyu, a 27-year-old researcher from OpenAI known for pushing the boundaries of AI agents, according to Bloomberg. If confirmed, the move would rank among the most high-profile defections of U.S.-trained talent to China—and it comes with

title: How AI is helping some small-scale farmers weather a changing climate
description: Artificial intelligence has the potential to boost productivity in African agriculture, which is lagging behind.
content:
By GREGORY GONDWE
MULANJE, Malawi (AP) — Alex Maere survived the destruction of Cyclone Freddy when it tore through southern Malawi in 2023. His farm didn’t.

title: Adobe raises annual revenue and profit forecasts on strong design software demand

title: Tencent Hires OpenAI Researcher as China Steps Up Talent Search
description: Tencent Holdings Ltd. has recruited a prominent artificial intelligence researcher from OpenAI in one of the most high-profile defections from the US AI sector to China, according to people familiar with the matter.
